abstract: “I actually think I’m a pretty good president. I think if I ran I could win.” — President Obama, advocating the value of term limits during a speech in Africa, even as he added that he thought he could win a third term if it were allowed.

headline.main: Verbatim: A Third Term? No, but Obama Thinks He Could Win

snippet: “I actually think I’m a pretty good president. I think if I ran I could win.” — President Obama, advocating the value of term limits during a speech in Africa, even as he added that he thought he could win a third term if it were allowed.
